languages.text: "Нам известно, что случилось на станции, дитя. Твоя связь с Атласом окрепла настолько, что смятение твоей души передалось и нам — произошедшее... потрясает".

traits.locale_text: "Нам известно, что случилось на станции, дитя. Твоя связь с Атласом окрепла настолько, что смятение твоей души передалось и нам — произошедшее... потрясает".
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "We know what happened at the station, child. Your connection to the Atlas has grown so strong, we felt the turmoil in your soul — and the events that transpired... have shaken us."
languages.original_text: "Нам известно, что случилось на станции, дитя. Твоя связь с Атласом окрепла настолько, что смятение твоей души передалось и нам — произошедшее... потрясает".

traits.locale_text: "We know what happened at the station, child. Your connection to the Atlas has grown so much we felt the turmoil in your soul — and the events that transpired... Have shaken us."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "We know what happened at the station, child. Your connection to the Atlas has grown so much we felt the turmoil in your soul — and the events that transpired... Have shaken us."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "We know what happened at the station, child. Your connection to the Atlas has grown so strong, we felt the turmoil in your soul — and the events that transpired... have shaken us."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "We know what happened at the station, child. Your connection to the Atlas has grown so strong, we felt the turmoil in your soul — and the events that transpired... have shaken us."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "We know what happened at the station, child. Your connection to the Atlas has grown so strong, we felt the turmoil in your soul — and the events that transpired... have shaken us."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “我们已经知道星站上发生了什么事情，孩子。你与群星圣仪的联系变得如此紧密，我们都感受到了你灵魂中的动荡。至于发生的那些事情……我们无比震惊。”
languages.original_text: "We know what happened at the station, child. Your connection to the Atlas has grown so strong, we felt the turmoil in your soul — and the events that transpired... have shaken us."

traits.locale_text: “我们已经知道星站上发生了什么事情，孩子。你与群星圣仪的联系变得如此紧密，我们都感受到了你灵魂中的动荡。至于发生的那些事情……我们无比震惊。”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Sabemos lo que sucedió en la estación, pequeña. Tu conexión con el Atlas se ha vuelto muy fuerte. Sentimos la preocupación en tu alma... y lo que sucedió... nos tiene consternados».
languages.original_text: "We know what happened at the station, child. Your connection to the Atlas has grown so strong, we felt the turmoil in your soul — and the events that transpired... have shaken us."

traits.locale_text: «Sabemos lo que sucedió en la estación, pequeña. Tu conexión con el Atlas se ha vuelto muy fuerte. Sentimos la preocupación en tu alma... y lo que sucedió... nos tiene consternados».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「ステーションで何があったかは存じている。アトラスとのつながりが強くなり、我々はあなたの魂の動揺を感じた…そして起こった出来事は…我々を揺さぶった」
languages.original_text: "We know what happened at the station, child. Your connection to the Atlas has grown so strong, we felt the turmoil in your soul — and the events that transpired... have shaken us."

traits.locale_text: 「ステーションで何があったかは存じている。アトラスとのつながりが強くなり、我々はあなたの魂の動揺を感じた…そして起こった出来事は…我々を揺さぶった」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Wir wissen, was auf der Station vorgefallen ist, Kind. Eure Verbindung zum Atlas ist so stark geworden, dass wir den Aufruhr in Eurer Seele gespürt haben – und die Ereignisse ... haben uns erschüttert."
languages.original_text: "We know what happened at the station, child. Your connection to the Atlas has grown so strong, we felt the turmoil in your soul — and the events that transpired... have shaken us."

traits.locale_text: "Wir wissen, was auf der Station vorgefallen ist, Kind. Eure Verbindung zum Atlas ist so stark geworden, dass wir den Aufruhr in Eurer Seele gespürt haben – und die Ereignisse ... haben uns erschüttert."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « Nous savons tout de ce qui s'est produit à la station, Enfant. Votre connexion à l'Atlas est désormais si forte, et nous avons ressenti les tourments qui agitaient votre âme. Ces événements nous ont... ébranlés. »
languages.original_text: "We know what happened at the station, child. Your connection to the Atlas has grown so strong, we felt the turmoil in your soul — and the events that transpired... have shaken us."

traits.locale_text: « Nous savons tout de ce qui s'est produit à la station, mon enfant. Votre connexion à l'Atlas est désormais si forte, et nous avons ressenti les tourments qui agitaient votre âme. Ces événements nous ont... ébranlés. »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "İstasyonda neler olduğunu biliyoruz çocuğum. Atlas'la olan bağlantın çok güçlenmiş. Ruhundaki çalkantıları hissedebiliyoruz. Yaşanan olaylar bizi derinden sarstı."
languages.original_text: "We know what happened at the station, child. Your connection to the Atlas has grown so strong, we felt the turmoil in your soul — and the events that transpired... have shaken us."

traits.locale_text: "İstasyonda neler olduğunu biliyoruz çocuğum. Atlas'la olan bağlantın çok güçlendi. Ruhundaki çalkantıları hissedebiliyoruz. Meydana gelen olaylar bizi derinden sarstı."
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
